entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:21 PM MST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:21 PM MST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:21 PM MST Tuesday 14 March 2023
